testCase.name: Actions should renderWithProviders a div element with specific class and styling
Actions should call the corresponding functions when Cancel, Modify, or Submit buttons are clicked
Actions should call the corresponding functions when Print, Share, or Return to dashboard buttons are clicked
Actions should set the confirm text to "Product creation approve" when sub_type is not provided and action is "approve"
Actions should set the confirm text to "Product creation reject" when sub_type is not provided and action is "reject"
Actions should set the confirm text to "Product activation approve" when sub_type is "activation" and action is "approve"
handleConfirm should call approveProduct when action is "approve"
handleConfirm should set setRejection to true when action is "reject"
handleConfirm should navigate to "/product-factory/investment?category=requests" when action is "cancel"
handleConfirm should do nothing when "action" parameter is not provided
handleMessages should set success text and open success modal when rejectSuccess is true
handleMessages should set success text and open success modal when approveSuccess is true
handleMessages should not set any text or open any modal when rejectSuccess and approveSuccess are both false
handleMessages should not set any text or open any modal when rejectError and approveError are both null
handleMessages should set failed text and subtext when rejectError and approveError are both defined
handleMessages should set failed text and subtext when rejectError is defined and approveError is null
